title: FS T206 Lot 16 Cards HOF SL Commons Graded and Raw!
author: Tim206

posts.post_title: FS T206 Lot 16 Cards HOF SL Commons Graded and Raw!
posts.post_content:
Thought I'd offer this lot on the B/S/T before it goes to ebay.  16 cards with hof and a sl.  Graded and raw.  Please pm offers, and all are considered.

Orval Overall (Hand Face Level) Sweet Cap 350 VG-EX PSA 4
Jack Powell (Horizontal) Sweet Cap 150 VG PSA 3
Sherry Magee (Portrait) Sweet Cap 159 G PSA 2
Kid Elberfeld Piedmont 150 SGC 20
Foley White (SL) Old Mill VG
Clark Griffith (HOF)(W Bat) Pdmt 350 VG
Home Run Baker (HOF) Pdmt 350 P
Pelty (Horizontal) Pdmt 150 VG/VG-EX
Murray (Portrait)(NY Ntl) Sw Cap 350-460 (Looks to be NrMt except for crease going diagnol through card :confused:)
Mike Donlin (W Bat) Sw Cap 350 VG-EX (Spot on left border)
McIntyre (Brkln AND Chi) Polar Bear VG
Lake (St. Louis Amer) Sweet Cap 350-460 Fac. 42 Overprint G
Birdie Cree (NY Amer) Sweet Cap 350 VG/VG-EX
Cy Seymour (W Bat) Pdmt 150 G-VG
Jordan (Brooklyn) Old Mill P
Wildfire Schulte (Back View) Old Mill (Brown???:rolleyes:) P

I am by no means a T206 expert or an expert on grading cards, but I do believe I've described them the best that I can.  Additional pictures are available upon request.  

Best Wishes!
